translated: but it is not the contact of one thing with another.

original: mngon sum du dngos po la reg na khyad par la the tshom za bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon sum du dngos po la reg na khyad par la the tshom za bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If there is contact with a thing in a direct perception, how can there be doubt about the distinction?

original: the tshom za na thob par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: the tshom za na thob par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If there is doubt, how can there be attainment?

original: thob pa yang the tshom dang rjes su mthun pa nyid de /
analyzed: thob pa yang the tshom dang rjes su mthun pa nyid de /
translated: Attainment is also consistent with doubt,

original: res 'ga' me 'ga' zhig thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' me 'ga' zhig thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because sometimes one attains some fire.

original: des na 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang /
translated: Therefore, in the case of a reason based on effect,

original: tha snyad 'ba' zhig sgrub @218b par zad kyi /
analyzed: tha snyad 'ba' zhig sgrub @218b par zad kyi /
translated: only a mere designation is established,

original: dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: but not a real thing.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la ni dngos po mthong ba'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la ni dngos po mthong ba'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: In the case of a natural inference, one gains knowledge by seeing the thing itself.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po ma mthong bar ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po ma mthong bar ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But in the case of an inference based on effect, how can one gain knowledge without seeing the thing itself?

original: don ni mthong ba 'ba' zhig nyid //
analyzed: don ni mthong ba 'ba' zhig nyid //
translated: The object is seen, but not gained.

original: thob min kun tshe yod pa las //
analyzed: thob min kun tshe yod pa las //
translated: When it exists for all,

original: dngos po de thob 'khrul pas kyang //
analyzed: dngos po de thob 'khrul pas kyang //
translated: even if one is mistaken about gaining the thing,

original: de don gnyer rnams 'jug par byed //
analyzed: de don gnyer rnams 'jug par byed //
translated: those who seek it will engage in it.

original: skra shad la sogs pa dag la mthong ba yod pa /
analyzed: skra shad la sogs pa dag la mthong ba yod pa /
translated: The existence of seeing such things as floating hairs

original: yul gzhan ma mthong cis ma yin //
analyzed: yul gzhan ma mthong cis ma yin //
translated: is not due to not seeing other objects.

original: dus gzhan khyab pa med ce na //
analyzed: dus gzhan khyab pa med ce na //
translated: If you say that it is not pervasive at other times,

original: yul gzhan la ni ji ltar yod //
analyzed: yul gzhan la ni ji ltar yod //
translated: how does it exist in other objects?

original: gal te yul gzhan du khyab pa 'ga' yang mi srid pa des na des nyid mi 'jig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul gzhan du khyab pa 'ga' yang mi srid pa des na des nyid mi 'jig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is impossible for it to be pervasive in other objects, then it is not destroyed by that.

original: dus gzhan la khyab pa yang mi srid pas de yang ji ltar zhig pa yin /
analyzed: dus gzhan la khyab pa yang mi srid pas de yang ji ltar zhig pa yin /
translated: Since it is also impossible for it to be pervasive at other times, how is it destroyed?

original: yul gzhan du ma dmigs kyang yul gzhan du dmigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: yul gzhan du ma dmigs kyang yul gzhan du dmigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Even though it is not observed in other objects, is it not observed in other objects?

original: ji ltar zhig pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhig pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it destroyed?

original: 'o na ni yul gzhan dus gzhan du yang dmigs pas ji ltar zhig pa yin //
analyzed: 'o na ni yul gzhan dus gzhan du yang dmigs pas ji ltar zhig pa yin //
translated: But if it is perceived in another place and at another time, how can it be destroyed?

original: dus gzhan du mthong zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dus gzhan du mthong zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is seen at another time.

original: 'di ni gnyi ga la mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyi ga la mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same for both of us.

original: de'i phyir / dngos gang ji ltar mthong ba de //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dngos gang ji ltar mthong ba de //
translated: Therefore, whatever thing is seen in such and such a way,

original: de lta nyid yin gzhan du min //
analyzed: de lta nyid yin gzhan du min //
translated: it is just that way, and not otherwise.

original: sngon po nyid du mthong ba yi //
analyzed: sngon po nyid du mthong ba yi //
translated: The blue that is seen as blue

original: sngon po dkar por yod ma yin //
analyzed: sngon po dkar por yod ma yin //
translated: does not exist as white.

original: des na de nyid bshig pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rgyu med par gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de nyid bshig pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rgyu med par gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not that it is destroyed, but rather that another does not arise without a cause.

original: de ma mthong ba na de zhig go zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam du zad do //
analyzed: de ma mthong ba na de zhig go zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam du zad do //
translated: When it is not seen, it is said to be destroyed, but this is mere conceit.

original: des na lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba ni yul de lta bu la rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba ni yul de lta bu la rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the definition of contradiction as non-coexistence is established in such a case.

original: don dam par na 'gal ba'i yul ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: don dam par na 'gal ba'i yul ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: But in the ultimate sense, the object of contradiction is cause and effect.

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba yang de kho na ltar yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba yang de kho na ltar yin no //
translated: The contradiction of mutually exclusive characteristics is just like that.

original: skad cig skyed par byed pa de ni rtag pa skyed par mi nus te des na rtag pa mi skye ba nyid do //
analyzed: skad cig skyed par byed pa de ni rtag pa skyed par mi nus te des na rtag pa mi skye ba nyid do //
translated: That which produces the momentary is not able to produce the permanent, and therefore the permanent is not produced.

original: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid rtag pa dang ma 'dres pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid rtag pa dang ma 'dres pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as impermanence is not mixed with permanence,

original: sngon po nyid la sogs pa yang phan tshun de bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon po nyid la sogs pa yang phan tshun de bzhin no //
translated: so it is with blue, etc.

original: 'gal ba 'di gnyis la don dam pa ni khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'di gnyis la don dam pa ni khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no difference in the ultimate sense between these two contradictions.

original: des na 'gal ba ni phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na 'gal ba ni phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, contradiction is just the incompatibility of mutual exclusion.

original: de yang don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
translated: And that is the nature of the object itself,

original: de lta ma yin na ni rang bzhin med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni rang bzhin med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: otherwise it would be without intrinsic nature.

original: de dag gi phan tshun mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa de yang gzhan la ltos nas mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi phan tshun mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa de yang gzhan la ltos nas mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the perception of that nature of mutual incompatibility is itself non-perception in relation to the other.

original: med pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni mi dmigs pa las yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni mi dmigs pa las yin no //
translated: All conventions of non-existence are from non-perception.

original: des na thams cad du sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tha dad par zad kyi don la tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba ni rigs par brjod @219a * //🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad du sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tha dad par zad kyi don la tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba ni rigs par brjod @219a * // pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a logical argument to say that there is no difference in meaning, only a difference in application.

original: dbang po las 'das pa rnams la ni 'gal ba de med pa'i phyir med pa sgrub pa'i 'gal ba dmigs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa rnams la ni 'gal ba de med pa'i phyir med pa sgrub pa'i 'gal ba dmigs pa med pa yin no //
translated: In the case of what is beyond the senses, there is no contradiction, so the non-perception of what is to be established is not a contradiction.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang ma yin no //
translated: It is not just non-perception.

original: ma dmigs so zhes bya ba de tsam gyis ni med do zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma dmigs so zhes bya ba de tsam gyis ni med do zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Just saying I do not perceive it does not mean it does not exist.

original: gang gis mthong ba yod pa la khyab pa des de skad du smra na ni mdzes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis mthong ba yod pa la khyab pa des de skad du smra na ni mdzes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one speaks in that way, it would be beautiful if one were to say that what exists is pervaded by what is seen.

original: de'i tshe yang thams cad mkhyen pa ni spangs pa ma yin te de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang thams cad mkhyen pa ni spangs pa ma yin te de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even at that time, omniscience is not abandoned, because that itself is omniscience.

original: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pas dmigs par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te de la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pas dmigs par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te de la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also not the case that what is to be known by omniscience, such as the other world, is not perceived, because there is no valid cognition for that.

original: bzlog pa la ni tshad ma bshad zin to //
analyzed: bzlog pa la ni tshad ma bshad zin to //
translated: The measure of the refutation has already been explained.🔽Therefore:

original: de'i phyir / ji ltar dngos rnams sgrub pa na //
analyzed: de'i phyir / ji ltar dngos rnams sgrub pa na //
translated: Just as the establishment of things

original: dngos po rnams kyi sgrub byed 'dod //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi sgrub byed 'dod //
translated: Is asserted to be the establishment of entities,

original: de bzhin dngos nyid rang ldog na //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos nyid rang ldog na //
translated: So, in the same way, the intrinsic nature

original: dngos rnams ldog par byed pa yin //
analyzed: dngos rnams ldog par byed pa yin //
translated: Is the refutation of entities.

original: ji ltar 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po nyid dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin gyi 'brel pa med pa ni ji ltar yang dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po nyid dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin gyi 'brel pa med pa ni ji ltar yang dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as because of the relation, the establishment of entities is the establishment of entities, and without a relation, it is not the establishment of entities in any way, so,

original: dngos po nyid rang log na dngos po'i ldog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po nyid rang log na dngos po'i ldog par byed pa yin no //
translated: in the same way, the intrinsic nature is the refutation of entities.

original: 'brel pa med par ni dngos po log na dngos po gzhan ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par ni dngos po log na dngos po gzhan ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: Without a relation, the cessation of one entity is not the cessation of another entity.

original: dper na / 'bras bu rgyu sgrub par byed pa'am /🔽khyab par bya ba khyab par byed pa bsgrub pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na / 'bras bu rgyu sgrub par byed pa'am / khyab par bya ba khyab par byed pa bsgrub pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, the effect establishes the cause,🔽and the pervaded establishes the pervader.

original: rgyu med pa 'bras bu med pa dang / khyab byed med pa khyab bya med pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa 'bras bu med pa dang / khyab byed med pa khyab bya med pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, the absence of the cause establishes the absence of the effect, and the absence of the pervader establishes the absence of the pervaded.

original: de lta ma yin na ni 'brel pa de nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni 'brel pa de nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then the relation itself would not exist.

original: 'brel pa'i ngo bo ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i ngo bo ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: This is the nature of the relation:

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the presence and absence of the reason in the presence and absence of the probandum.

original: gzhan ni 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'brel pa yin no //
translated: There is no other relation.

original: 'dis ni rtogs pas sbyar ba'i chos //🔽phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las //
analyzed: 'dis ni rtogs pas sbyar ba'i chos // phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las //
translated: This is the way the reason is applied by the logicians:🔽The reason is present in similar instances

original: gang rung nyid sogs gsal yin te /🔽ci yang rung ba srid phyir ro //
analyzed: gang rung nyid sogs gsal yin te / ci yang rung ba srid phyir ro //
translated: and is absent in all dissimilar instances.🔽Because it is possible that the reason is present in some dissimilar instances,

original: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba nyid ni /
analyzed: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba nyid ni /
translated: the reason is said to be “present in some dissimilar instances.”

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la gcig dang yang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la gcig dang yang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: The reason is not related to either of the two, the permanent and the impermanent.

original: phyogs ni 'dod pas byas pa yin la de'i rjes su 'brang bas mthun pa'i phyogs gang yin par ste /
analyzed: phyogs ni 'dod pas byas pa yin la de'i rjes su 'brang bas mthun pa'i phyogs gang yin par ste /
translated: The similar instance is made by the desire to prove something, and the dissimilar instance is made by the desire to disprove something.

original: de yang de lta bu nyid do //
analyzed: de yang de lta bu nyid do //
translated: The reason is present in the similar instance and is absent in the dissimilar instance.

original: des na 'dod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the reason is related to the desire alone, it does not prove the thing.

original: gzhan du 'brel pa ni gzhan go bar byed pa ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du 'brel pa ni gzhan go bar byed pa ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, a relation would not make known another thing, because that would lead to an absurdity.

original: gang gis de med par rtogs pa 'ga' zhig las ldog par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de med par rtogs pa 'ga' zhig las ldog par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor does it cause one to turn away from something, because one would not understand that it does not exist.

original: 'dod pas byas pa'i phyogs nyid ni 'brel pa nyid yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pas byas pa'i phyogs nyid ni 'brel pa nyid yod pa yin te /
translated: The relation itself is the very position that is accepted.

original: des na phyogs dang mthun pa'i @219b phyogs gang rung zhig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs dang mthun pa'i @219b phyogs gang rung zhig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a means of knowing that a position is consistent with a similar position.

original: de bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is not a means of knowing that a position is inconsistent with a dissimilar position.

original: de'i phyir sgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni 'brel pa nyid la 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni 'brel pa nyid la 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the establishment of a proof and a refutation is the relation itself.

original: de la'ang khyab par byed pa'i chos //
analyzed: de la'ang khyab par byed pa'i chos //
translated: And in that, the pervader is

original: khyab bya ldog pa'i go byed 'dod //
analyzed: khyab bya ldog pa'i go byed 'dod //
translated: accepted as the means of knowing the absence of the pervaded.

original: gal te ngang gi ldog pa ni //
analyzed: gal te ngang gi ldog pa ni //
translated: If there is a natural absence,

original: rnam 'gar yongs su bcad na'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gar yongs su bcad na'o //
translated: it is ascertained in some way.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is a summarizing verse.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn’t the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature itself the proof?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de la don dam par na go bya go byed med do //
analyzed: de la don dam par na go bya go byed med do //
translated: For, ultimately, there is nothing to be understood and nothing to understand it.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa yin no ;
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa yin no ;
translated: The non-apprehension of the object of apprehension is itself non-existence.

original: / des na grub pa des khyab par bya ba med par sgrub par byed pa yin no //🔽med pa la ni de nyid kyi //
analyzed: / des na grub pa des khyab par bya ba med par sgrub par byed pa yin no // med pa la ni de nyid kyi //
translated: Thus, by this proof, the probandum is established as non-existent.🔽The non-apprehension of the existent

original: tshad med rtags su brjod gang yin //
analyzed: tshad med rtags su brjod gang yin //
translated: is said to be the evidence for non-existence.

original: de ni shin tu rmongs don te //
analyzed: de ni shin tu rmongs don te //
translated: But that is for the sake of the extremely confused,

original: gnag rdzi mo bar grags phyir ro //
analyzed: gnag rdzi mo bar grags phyir ro //
translated: because it is well known even to cowherds and women.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid dngos po med pa yin pa 'di ni gnag rdzi dang bud med kyi bar la grub pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid dngos po med pa yin pa 'di ni gnag rdzi dang bud med kyi bar la grub pa yin no //
translated: This very non-apprehension of intrinsic nature is non-existence, and this is established even for cowherds and women.

original: 'on kyang grangs can bstan bcos kyi lta bas rmongs pa rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang grangs can bstan bcos kyi lta bas rmongs pa rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: However, it is for the sake of those confused by the views of the Sāṅkhya treatise that it is said,

original: med pa'i tha snyad 'di ni gzhan du yang 'di tsam gyis rgyu mtshan can yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad 'di ni gzhan du yang 'di tsam gyis rgyu mtshan can yin te /
translated: “The convention of non-existence is the evidence for non-existence.” This is because the convention of non-existence is also the reason for other things.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: bde ba la sogs pa dang skyes bu tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dang skyes bu tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
translated: pleasure, etc. and the person would not be established as different.

original: bstan bcos nyid la tha dad par grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: bstan bcos nyid la tha dad par grub bo zhe na /
translated: But they are established as different in the treatise itself.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not,

original: tha dad pa ni tshad ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni tshad ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because difference depends on a valid cognition.

original: phan tshun tha par dmigs pa med par ni /
analyzed: phan tshun tha par dmigs pa med par ni /
translated: Without the mutual observation of difference,

original: bstan bcos nyid kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi 'grub la /
analyzed: bstan bcos nyid kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi 'grub la /
translated: the treatise itself is not established as different from each other.

original: tha dad du bya bar dmigs pa de nyid ni gzhan mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad du bya bar dmigs pa de nyid ni gzhan mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The observation of difference is itself the non-observation of another.

original: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag kyang mi dmigs pa med na tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag kyang mi dmigs pa med na tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
translated: And the manifest and the non-manifest are not established as different without the non-observation of the other.🔽Non-observation is just this:

original: mi dmigs pa ni 'di tsam zhig / med la nges pa'i 'bras can yin //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni 'di tsam zhig / med la nges pa'i 'bras can yin //
translated: the result of the ascertainment of non-existence.

original: de yang snang bar 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: de yang snang bar 'dod pa yi //
translated: And that is the non-appearance

original: rgyu'am rang bzhin snang med nyid //
analyzed: rgyu'am rang bzhin snang med nyid //
translated: of a cause or of a nature that is supposed to appear.

original: mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa gsum kho na ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa gsum kho na ste /
translated: Non-observation is just threefold:

original: rgyu dang bya bar byed pa yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang bya bar byed pa yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: the non-observation of a cause, the non-observation of an effect, and the non-observation of a nature.

original: de yang rgyu la sogs pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa mi dmigs pa kho na go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rgyu la sogs pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa mi dmigs pa kho na go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, nonobservation that has the characteristic of observing causes and so on is the only means of understanding.

original: gzhan dang rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dang rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pas skyed pa'i rtags can gyi shes pa bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed pa ni slu ba med pa can yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pas skyed pa'i rtags can gyi shes pa bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed pa ni slu ba med pa can yin te /
translated: Therefore the cognition that is the evidence of the effect, nature, and nonobservation is the means of understanding the object of affirmation, because it is nondeceptive.

original: des na des dngos po nyid de ltar grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na des dngos po nyid de ltar grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since it establishes that thing itself,

original: dngos po'i chos ma yin pa ma yin no //🔽gal te kha dog 'di mi rtag @220a * //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ma yin pa ma yin no // gal te kha dog 'di mi rtag @220a * //
translated: it is not a property of the thing that is not so.

original: po'o zhes rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid sbyor ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: po'o zhes rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid sbyor ba ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not the case that impermanence is applied to the specific characteristic of this color,

original: des na kha dog spyi la sbyor phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: des na kha dog spyi la sbyor phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: then how is it that it is said that because it is applied to the universal of color and so on?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: rjes su dpag pas mi rtags sogs //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas mi rtags sogs //
translated: The mode of apprehension by inference

original: 'dzin pa la ni tshul 'dir 'dod //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ni tshul 'dir 'dod //
translated: is asserted in this system.

original: gzhan du gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan du gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir //
translated: Otherwise, it would apprehend the universal.

original: tshad ma nyid du 'dod ma yin //🔽rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang kha dog nyid dam /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid du 'dod ma yin // rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang kha dog nyid dam /
translated: But it is not accepted as a valid cognition.

original: mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzung nas kha dog la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes mi rtag pa nyid dang yid kyis sbyor bar slob dpon gyis bshad pa gang yin pa la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzung nas kha dog la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes mi rtag pa nyid dang yid kyis sbyor bar slob dpon gyis bshad pa gang yin pa la /
translated: The master Dignāga explained that the general and specific characteristics are not the objects of expression, and that, having apprehended color itself or impermanence, etc., one applies impermanence, etc., to color, etc., as in “color is impermanent,” etc.

original: kha dog spyi la sbyor ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshul 'di bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: kha dog spyi la sbyor ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshul 'di bshad pa yin no //
translated: The present method of explanation is that one should apply impermanence, etc., to the universal of color, etc.

original: kha dog gi spyi la mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag pas rtogs na tshad ma gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha dog gi spyi la mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag pas rtogs na tshad ma gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one understands impermanence by inferring it in relation to the universal of color, then there would be another valid cognition.

original: chos can spyi de gang gis rtogs //
analyzed: chos can spyi de gang gis rtogs //
translated: By what is the universal of the subject understood?

original: rjes su dpag pas rtogs na ni de la yang chos can gzhan dgos pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas rtogs na ni de la yang chos can gzhan dgos pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is understood by inference, then since another subject would be necessary for that, there would be an infinite regress.

original: gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi dus phyis 'byung ba rtags can gyi shes pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni tshad ma gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi dus phyis 'byung ba rtags can gyi shes pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni tshad ma gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: When the inferential cognition that arises later than the time of the direct perception is not the cognition of the sign, then at that time it would be another valid cognition.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhe na /🔽gnyi ga la yang la na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhe na / gnyi ga la yang la na /
translated: because it is associated with its own characteristic.

original: de la ni tshad ma nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni tshad ma nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But in both cases, it is not a valid cognition.

original: gnyi gar mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir dang / spyi 'dzin pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni gzung ba 'dzin pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gar mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir dang / spyi 'dzin pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni gzung ba 'dzin pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are established by direct perception, and because inference that apprehends a universal is not a valid cognition with regard to the object that is apprehended.

original: mi rtag pa nyid mngon sum gyis ji ltar grub ce na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid mngon sum gyis ji ltar grub ce na /
translated: How is impermanence established by direct perception?🔽Thus:

original: 'di ltar / dngos las mi rtag gzhan du med //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dngos las mi rtag gzhan du med //
translated: Impermanence is not different from a thing.

original: de yang dbang po las sngar grub //
analyzed: de yang dbang po las sngar grub //
translated: And that is established prior to the sense faculty.

original: du ma'i dngos de brjod bya min //
analyzed: du ma'i dngos de brjod bya min //
translated: The many things are not the object of expression.

original: rtogs las skyed chos brjod bya yin //
analyzed: rtogs las skyed chos brjod bya yin //
translated: The object of expression is the property to be produced from the realization.

original: mi rtag pa nyid dam kha dog nyid la sogs pa dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ni med kyi 'on kyang de 'dra ba de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid dam kha dog nyid la sogs pa dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ni med kyi 'on kyang de 'dra ba de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
translated: Impermanence, color, etc., are not different from the nature of a thing. But that is just the nature of a thing.

original: rnam par rtog pas de'i ngo bo 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir de nyid spyi'i ngo bos 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas de'i ngo bo 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir de nyid spyi'i ngo bos 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Because conceptual thought is unable to apprehend its nature, it is just that which becomes the universal nature.

original: spyi ni 'dzin pa'i byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: spyi ni 'dzin pa'i byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni med do //
translated: The universal is the activity of apprehending, but there is no other universal.

original: 'di sngon po zhes mngon sum la snang ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa ni rjes su dpag pa la 'di ni sngon po'i zhes snang ba med kyi de nyid de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di sngon po zhes mngon sum la snang ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa ni rjes su dpag pa la 'di ni sngon po'i zhes snang ba med kyi de nyid de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the object that appears to perception as “blue” is not different from that which appears to inference as “the referent of the term blue.” The latter does not appear to perception, but it is that very object that is designated in that way.

original: 'on te / 'di ni sngar gyi sngon po ji lta ba de lta bur gyur pa nyid do zhes snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pas ma bzung ba'i spyi nyid 'dzin pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te / 'di ni sngar gyi sngon po ji lta ba de lta bur gyur pa nyid do zhes snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pas ma bzung ba'i spyi nyid 'dzin pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the universal is apprehended by the cognition that apprehends the object as it is, then the universal is not apprehended by the prior and subsequent cognitions.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: snga ma pyi ma'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i spyi ni ma dmigs kyi de nyid des tha snyad byed pa ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: snga ma pyi ma'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i spyi ni ma dmigs kyi de nyid des tha snyad byed pa ni spyi yin la /
translated: A universal that is different from the nature of the prior and subsequent is not observed. That very object is designated in that way. That is the universal.

original: tha snyad kyi rten kyang rang gi mtshan nyid de kho na yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi rten kyang rang gi mtshan nyid de kho na yin no //
translated: The basis of designation is only its own nature.

original: gal te mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyi rnams phan tshun dang / de dang ldan pa las tha dad @220b pas du ma nyid yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyi rnams phan tshun dang / de dang ldan pa las tha dad @220b pas du ma nyid yin nam zhe na /
translated: If you say that universals such as impermanence, etc., are multiple because they are different from each other and from that which possesses them,

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: then we reply:

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid /
translated: The nature of a particular is not🔽a multiple entity.

original: du ma'i dngos po de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: du ma'i dngos po de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That is, it is not an object of expression.

original: tha dad pa ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis sbyar ba yin no //
translated: Difference is applied by mere conceptual thought, which arises from the power of beginningless latent propensities.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni ldog pa tha dad pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yongs su brtags pas tha dad par lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni ldog pa tha dad pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yongs su brtags pas tha dad par lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Conceptual thought engages by way of superimposition, because it is applied by way of the superimposition of difference in terms of the affirmation and negation of pervasion.

original: spyi yi rten ni grub pa na //
analyzed: spyi yi rten ni grub pa na //
translated: When the basis of a universal is established,

original: spyi de nyid ni grub pa yin //🔽de ma grub na de ltar de //
analyzed: spyi de nyid ni grub pa yin // de ma grub na de ltar de //
translated: then that universal itself is established.🔽If it is not established, then it is an inference

original: rab tu grub phyir rjes dpog yin //
analyzed: rab tu grub phyir rjes dpog yin //
translated: because it is well established in that way.

original: spyi ni tha snyad tsam yin la /
analyzed: spyi ni tha snyad tsam yin la /
translated: A universal is a mere convention.

original: tha snyad kyang tha snyad kyi yul rab tu grub pa na /
analyzed: tha snyad kyang tha snyad kyi yul rab tu grub pa na /
translated: And a convention is well established when the object of the convention is well established.

original: des pa'am / gzhi mthun pa nyid du rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: des pa'am / gzhi mthun pa nyid du rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
translated: It is established that they are the same basis.

original: / tha snyad ma grub na ni /
analyzed: / tha snyad ma grub na ni /
translated: If the conventional is not established,

original: rgyu mtshan bstan pas tha snyad byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan bstan pas tha snyad byed pa yin te /
translated: then the reason is taught in order to make the conventional.

original: tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan brjed pa rgyu mtshan dran pa'i sgo nas yul gyi ma yin pa de lta na yang de don du gnyer ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan brjed pa rgyu mtshan dran pa'i sgo nas yul gyi ma yin pa de lta na yang de don du gnyer ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'gyur bas /
translated: Even though the reason for the conventional is forgotten, and the object is not remembered, still, because of the desire for the object, one engages in it.

original: gang du yod pa der ni thob pa yin la gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gor ma chag go //
analyzed: gang du yod pa der ni thob pa yin la gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gor ma chag go //
translated: Therefore, it is certain that one obtains the object where it exists, but not elsewhere.

original: mngon sum du gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po 'dzin pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po 'dzin pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In the case of a reason of nature that is manifest, and in the case of a reason of effect, there is no apprehension of the thing,

original: thams cad du ma bzung ba nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du ma bzung ba nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is obtained without being apprehended at all.

original: thob par bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: thob par bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: What is to be obtained is the future,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin na /
translated: but not its own nature.

original: de ji ltar 'dzin /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'dzin /
translated: How can it be apprehended?

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the nature of that which will arise,
